aboutMeSection.text1: Hello, I'm Vivian Bruchon, a web developer based in Valence in Drôme (France).
aboutMeSection.text2: I'm specialize in building modern and responsive web applications using the latest technologies. With a keen eye for design and a passion for coding, I strive to create beautiful and user-friendly digital experiences.
aboutMeSection.text3: Let's connect and create something amazing together!

experiences.title: Web Developer Internship
experiences.description: After completing the first phase of my training at the campus, I had the opportunity to do my internship at Le Moulin Digital. This one-year experience allowed me to complete several significant projects, Mardinnov', Cédille Formation, Archimède. Working independently on these projects with the support of a mentor, I took charge of the entire process, from prototyping to final delivery, while maintaining regular follow-ups with clients.

experiences.title: Web & Apps Developer Training
experiences.description: My 18-month journey at the Campus Numérique was a complete immersion into the world of Web & Apps Developer. The first 6 months laid the foundations for my technical and collaborative skills, while the 12-month internship phase provided an opportunity to deepen these skills while applying them in real professional contexts.

testimonials.name: Xavier Masclaux
testimonials.content: Vivian understood our needs and developed tailored solutions. Autonomous and responsive, he solved problems by seeking necessary information or referring to his peers. His ability to adapt to project changes and train users was appreciated. Overall, he exceeded our expectations and integrated fully into our team.

testimonials.name: Jean-Philippe Falavel
testimonials.content: Vivian worked on the redesign of the www.mardinnov.com website in 2022 on Wordpress. Based on the newly created graphic charter, he completely created the new website. Very attentive to needs and proactive, he was very responsive and adhered to the schedule of the specifications. I recommend him for his professionalism!

testimonials.name: Stéphanie Escandell
testimonials.content: Following the creation of the Cédille Formation website, I am satisfied with our collaboration with Vivian. His attentive listening and pedagogy greatly facilitated the understanding of each stage of the process, especially for a novice like me. Vivian was able to respond effectively to our expectations and adapt the site to our requirements. His professionalism and expertise contributed to the implementation of this project. I highly recommend Vivian's services.

testimonials.name: David Escandell
testimonials.content: Vivian understood the project, understood our expectations and requirements. We are very satisfied with the work done, with the website SEO. He contributed to the success of this project. I highly recommend his services for any company looking to develop a quality online presence. A big thank you to Vivian.
